Header: Ordinance presented to declare Sri Pada a sacred area
Content: The presentation of the ordinance to declare Sri Pada as a sacred area was held at the Sri Pada Raja Maha Vihare, Galpottawala. Former President Maithripala Sirisena presided over the presentation of the Sannaspathra which declares Sri Pada as a sacred area. The Sannaspathra was presented to the Chief Incumbent of the Sri Pada Vihare the Ven. Bengamuwe Dhammadinna Thera. A ‘Sannaspathra’ to make the Maha Saman Devalaya a sacred area was also presented. It was handed over to Basnayake Nilame Migara Jayasundara.
